text: @senatemajldr How is it possible to suddenly have $2 trillion to give handouts to buy votes, but not enough foresight or funds to plan and budget properly to prevent or respond adequately to the COVID-19 pandemic? This is the question people need to ask Trump and Republican Leaders.
